title: Grilled Cheese With Kimchi
full_text:
Grilled Cheese With Kimchi
Close
Jump to recipe
Cook
15 mins
Active
12 mins
Total
15 mins
Serves
1 sandwich
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
tablespoons
(
30
g
)
butter
, cut into 3 even pieces
2
slices
hearty white bread
, such as Pepperidge Farm or Arnold
2
slices
American, cheddar, or
Jack cheese
1/2
cup
kimchi
(
3
ounces
;
85
g
), drained and roughly chopped
Kosher salt
Directions
In a large non-stick skillet, melt one-third of butter over medium heat until foaming subsides. Add both bread slices and cook, swirling occasionally, until pale golden brown on bottom side, about 2 minutes.
Serious Eats / Amanda Suarez
Transfer to a work surface toasted side up. Place one cheese slice on top of one slice of bread. Top with kimchi and second cheese slice. Close sandwich, with both toasted sides facing inwards.
Serious Eats / Amanda Suarez
Melt one more piece of butter in the skillet and reduce heat to medium low. Add sandwich and cook, swirling occasionally, until deep, even golden brown, about 5 minutes. Remove sandwich using a flexible metal spatula. Add the remaining butter. Return sandwich to skillet toasted-side up. Season with salt. Cook, swirling occasionally, until second side is deep, even golden brown and cheese is thoroughly melted, about 5 minutes. Serve immediately.
Serious Eats / Amanda Suarez
